NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Service Quality and Business or the cell corresponding to Tour Operators and Business?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Marketing and Adventure or the cell corresponding to Events and Wellness?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Attractions and Budget or the cell corresponding to Cruises and Seasonal?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Destinations and Adventure or the cell corresponding to Destinations and Luxury?

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.31 to 0.38?
